Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
At SmartBear, we deliver the complete visibility developers need to make each release better than the last. Our award winning and industry favorite tools TestComplete, Swagger, Cucumber, ReadyAPI, Zephyr are trusted by over 16 million developers, testers, and software engineers at 32,000+ organizations – including world-renowned innovators like Adobe, JetBlue, FedEx, and Microsoft.

Machine Learning Engineer

You will lead the development of end-to-end machine learning pipelines with focus on solving core AI/ML problems
Work in a newly formed AI group with start-up-like freedom and big tech safety
Tech Stack: Python, Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow), Cloud Computing

About the role:

To build and extend SmartBear’s success and growth, we are developing advanced AI techniques to create innovative solutions for state-of-the-art applications in the software development life cycle. The newly formed AI and Data Science group is working on computer vision, natural language processing, test data/code/case generation, software quality analysis/forecast, as well as other AI and data analytics projects for all SmartBear products.

We are looking for a skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join the team and accelerate the NLP development process.

Analyze product use cases and operation data to formulize machine learning problems
Develop end-to-end machine learning pipelines, from data digestion to solution deployment, in collaboration with other R&D teams
Optimize machine learning solutions by employing deep learning architectures, implementing advanced algorithms, processing relevant data, and training machine learning models
Discuss project ideas, progresses, issues and risks timely and precisely
Acquire state-of-the-art machine learning knowledge by following the latest development of the field
Automate routine tasks and build prototypes to showcase novel ideas
Support issues in the production system as reported by test engineers and end users

We are looking for you if you have:

An advanced degree (Master or Ph.D.) in computer science, data science, electrical and computer engineering, or applied mathematics
3+ years working experience in machine learning area, but fresh Ph.D. is encouraged to apply
Extensive experience in developing complex machine learning solutions using Python (or relevant program language) and deep learning framework (PyTorch or Tensorflow)
In-depth knowledge in using sequence-to-sequence models, GPT and other deep-learning based natural language processing techniques
Hands-on experience in using cloud computing infrastructure (GCP, AWS or Azure)
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to dive into details of algorithms and experimental results
Effective communication skills to discuss with other ML engineers, software developers, and product managers
